body.pages: You should receive pages, including this cover sheet. If you do not receive all of the pages, please call Sally Pizarro at 212-880-3094
body.comments: The attachment is from John Sorrells. Also, I have a large package of e-mails memos and Trial Reports for your review. If you can, please advise as to whether I should send the package to Patricia, or to you at the trial site. Thanks, Sally

footer.disclaimer: THIS FACSIMILE TRANSMISSION AND/OR THE DOCUMENTS ACCOMPANYING IT MAY CONTAIN PRIVILEGED AND CONFIDENTIAL INFORMATION BELONGING TO THE SENDER. The information is intended only for use by the addressee or entity named above. If you are not the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any disclosure, copying, distribution or the taking of any action in reliance of the contents of this information is strictly prohibited by law. If you have received this transmission in error, please notify the sender immediately.
